title: Bug 11866 - Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: Bug 11866 - Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
OB:
The labels in the Update Test Suite dialog are incorrect. 
1. The label 'Test Classes to be included' is written as 'TestClasses' without a space.
2. The status line mentions that methods are being selected instead of types.
3. The action name is written as 'TestSuite' instead of 'Test Suite'.
EB:
The labels in the Update Test Suite dialog should be correct and properly formatted:
1. The label 'Test Classes to be included' should include a space between 'Test' and 'Classes'.
2. The status line should accurately mention that types are being selected instead of methods.
3. The action name should be written as 'Test Suite' instead of 'TestSuite'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue in the Update Test Suite dialog:
1. Open the dialog.
2. Look at the label 'Test Classes to be included'.
3. Read the status line.
4. Observe the action name in the dialog.
